MSG_HELP:
[Poop Cleaner Bot](https://github.com/derogab/poop-cleaner) is a bot that helps you manage spam on a telegram group, thanks to the support of group members. When a message gets a predetermined number of reactions of type "ğŸ’©" the bot deletes the message from the group. 


Commands:
/start - Start the bot.
/help - Show this help message.
/configs - Show instance configurations.
/donate - Buy coffee for bot maintainers.

Usage:
React with ğŸ’© to messages that you consider spam and believe should be deleted.


The source code is available [on GitHub](https://github.com/derogab/poop-cleaner) under [MIT license](https://github.com/derogab/poop-cleaner/blob/master/LICENSE). To run a own instance you needs to follow simple [instructions](https://github.com/derogab/poop-cleaner?tab=readme-ov-file#configuration).
